authFailure.title: Authentication Failure
authFailure.message2: Make sure the device has internet access.

emailCheck.message1: The email have not been verified yet.
emailCheck.message2: Check your inbox and spam folder to complete the verification.

registerFailure.title: Failed to create account
registerFailure.usedEmail: The email address is already in use by another account.

registerSuccess.title: Account created
registerSuccess.message1: A verification email have been sent to {{email}}.
registerSuccess.message2: Access will only be granted upon email verification.

validation.passwordConstraint: Passwords must contain at least: 1 upper case letter, 1 lower case letter, 1 number or special character

modal.defaultErrorMessage: Oops, something unexpected happened. Please try again later or contact support.
